price: Na akasema: Hakika mimi nahama, nakwenda kwa Mola wangu Mlezi; Yeye ataniongoa.
arabic: وَقَالَ إِنِّي ذَاهِبٌ إِلَىٰ رَبِّي سَيَهۡدِينِ
footnotes: Ibrahim alipo kata tamaa nao, kuwa hawaamini tena, alisema: Mimi ninahama kwendea pahala alipo niamrisha Mola wangu Mlezi nende. Mola wangu Mlezi atanihidi aniongoze mpaka nifike pahala pa utulivu, penye amani, na nchi nzuri.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: waqāla innī dhāhibun ilā rabbī sayahdīni
